name: WildKids
description: This is a very serious and serious game, so in addition to the time still. Magic elements are also there! If you don't have enough nerves and a heart-like eye, be careful of the maliciousness from the WildKids! The content of this game is too real, don't imitate it easily!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 2.5GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: HD4400 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 256 MB available space Additional Notes: 1920*1080
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 3.50GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT520 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: 1920*1080
